[[Image:Picasa logo.gif|right|150px|]]
On [[July 13]], [[2004]] Google acquired [http://picasa.com Picasa], a software for management and sharing of digital photographs. Picasa has also been integrated with Google's Blogger. It is currently free.
On [[July 13]], [[2004]] Google acquired [http://picasa.com Picasa], a software for management and sharing of digital photographs. Picasa has also been integrated with Google's Blogger. It is currently free.
  +
===[[AdWords]]===
  +
Adwords is a service which allows companies to sign up through google and have their ads appear on any google search pag, [[GMail]] e-mail or AdSense page if certain keywords are displayed. The AdWords service is Google's largest source of income. The company only has to pay google per click and there is a bidding system to determine whose ad is displayed at the top of the page.
===[[AdSense]]===
===[[AdSense]]===
AdSense enables text or image advertisements to be displayed on websites that want ads to help raise money. The ads are administered by Google and generate revenue on a per-click basis. Google utilizes its search technology to serve ads based on website content, the user's geographical location, and other factors. Those wanting to advertise with Google's targeted ad system may sign up through [[AdWords]].
